thread.title: Frequent Business Traveler Magazine publishes 4th TSA satisfaction survey
thread.title_full: Frequent Business Traveler Magazine publishes 4th TSA satisfaction survey

author: Gulli Arnason
title: Frequent Business Traveler Magazine publishes 4th TSA satisfaction survey
text:
Frequent Business Traveler Magazine publishes 4th TSA satisfaction survey 
  28, 2015 
For the fourth year in a row, Frequent Business Traveler magazine is asking frequent flyers to rate their experiences with Transportation Security Administration security checkpoints at our nation´s airports.The online study, conducted in partnership with FlyerTalk, a worldwide travel community, and ExpertFlyer, a provider of air travel information tools, asks how effective the TSA´s screening procedures are and if they are effective in preventing acts of terrorism on an aircraft. It also looks at attitudes towards trusted traveler programs such as TSA PreCheck.The survey, which will run until September 24, is now open online at http://accura.cc/6090dj
